Mathos AI is an AI-powered math solver and personalized tutor, built to help students solve complex math problems while enhancing their understanding of math concepts at all levels. Trusted by over 2 million students from more than 200 countries, Mathos AI is more than just a calculator—it’s a comprehensive math learning solution for students, teachers, and lifelong learners alike. Whether you’re tackling basic algebra, geometry, or advanced calculus, Mathos AI provides accurate, instant solutions with detailed, step-by-step explanations to help you master math with confidence.

Key Features:
-Math Problem Solver: Solve complex math problems instantly with step-by-step explanations that improve your understanding.

-PDF Homework Helper: Upload your homework PDFs and let Mathos solve problems directly from the document. Annotate, take notes, and interact with PDFs for a seamless learning experience.

-AI Tutor: Receive personalized tutoring with voice and drawing recognition. The AI adapts to your learning style and pace, ensuring tailored guidance and explanations.

-Graphing Calculator: Visualize equations and functions interactively with a powerful graphing calculator for plotting graphs and solving complex equations.

-Dedicated Calculator Collection: Access a variety of specialized calculators, covering: Fraction, Algebra, Graphing, Integral and Derivative, Quadratic, Square Root, Simplify, Limit, Factor, Scientific Notation, Antiderivative, etc.

Why Mathos:
-Get the Most Accurate Solution: Mathos AI offers the most accurate math solutions across every level and topic—whether you’re solving algebra, calculus, quadratic equation, scientific notation, or anything in between. Our advanced AI model is 20% more accurate than ChatGPT and any other tool out there, giving you answers you can trust.

-Homework Help That’s Quick and Easy
Getting help with Mathos AI is super easy and convenient. You can solve your homework problems using a variety of interaction methods—whether it’s uploading and editing PDF, snapping a photo of the problem, typing out the text, drawing it, or even using your voice. Plus, with multi-device sync, you can switch between your phone, tablet, or laptop without missing a beat.

-Learn from Your Personalized AI Tutor: With Mathos AI is your own AI math tutor that really understands how you learn. Mathos AI can recognize your drawings and voice inputs, so whether you prefer to speak your problems or sketch them out, we’re here to help. Our tutor follows your pace and provides the most tailored guidance and explanations for each step of your work.

-All the Math Tools You Need: Mathos AI comes with everything - an advanced graphing calculator, dedicated calculators for different math topics, and more. From solving equations to plotting graphs, we’ve got the tools that make learning math super easy.
